The &SEMIGROUPS; package
&SEMIGROUPS; package overview
Introduction
This is the manual for the &SEMIGROUPS; package for &GAP; version &VERSION;. &SEMIGROUPS; &VERSION; is a distant descendant of the
http://schmidt.nuigalway.ie/monoid/index.html by Goetz Pfeiffer, Steve A. Linton, Edmund F. Robertson, and Nik Ruskuc.
From Version 3.0.0, &SEMIGROUPS; includes a copy of the &LIBSEMIGROUPS; C++ library which contains implementations of the Froidure-Pin, Todd-Coxeter, and Knuth-Bendix algorithms (among others) that &SEMIGROUPS; utilises.
If you find a bug or an issue with the package, please visit the
https://github.com/semigroups/Semigroups/issues .
